name: The Adventures of Taplow
description:
The Adventures of Taplow is a simple game with pixel-art used in it. It is an adventurous game where you will find enemies, water and many hurdles stopping you to clear the level. 

You can choose the level with your choice or just opt to play from start.

-> 6 exciting levels

-> 2 boss battles

-> Choose level with freedom

So, what are you waiting for. Download the game and play it now.
